tool.name: Refinery test tool 1-N
tool.description: for testing Galaxy workflow execution from Refinery
tool.command: ## Run the splitter tool on a single file & partition it in a way that regenerates each of our original text files. $__tool_directory__/refinery_file_splitter.py -i $input_file
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Purpose**
To test Galaxy workflow execution and monitoring from Refinery.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs and outputs**
This wrapper will accept single file containing the concatenated contents of N files ran through the "refinery_test_tool" as input and produce N outputs containing the original contents of the N files.
